motion_title: Mega-Motion: Comprehensive Framework for Ethical Human-AI Partnership Governance

classification.motion_title: Mega-Motion: Comprehensive Framework for Ethical Human-AI Partnership Governance
classification.classification_reasoning: The motion establishes a comprehensive framework for ethical human-AI governance, creating policies and guidelines (POLICY) across multiple domains. It includes constitutional amendments (CONST) to mandate human oversight and technical requirements (TECH) like cognitive shadow architectures. The primary focus is on policy creation, with secondary constitutional and technical elements.

tasks.description: Research existing policies and best practices for human-AI collaboration frameworks, focusing on trust, mutual growth, and ethical reflection mechanisms
tasks.notes: Prioritize studies on AI ethics frameworks, international standards, and case studies of successful human-AI partnership models

tasks.description: Develop the Comprehensive Governance Framework document incorporating ethical principles, lifecycle assessments, and committee structures
tasks.notes: Must include technical specifications, ethical review protocols, and alignment with constitutional mandates for human oversight

tasks.description: Gather feedback from ethics experts, legal advisors, technical teams, and societal stakeholders on constitutional amendments and oversight mechanisms
tasks.notes: Focus on balancing accountability, transparency, and human dignity in AI governance while ensuring operational feasibility

tasks.description: Integrate stakeholder feedback into the governance framework and prepare for official adoption by the Governance Council
tasks.notes: Include final audit protocols, conflict resolution procedures, and implementation timelines for all mandated components

blockers.description: Ambiguous language in Section 1.1.1 ('trust, mutual growth, and intentional collaboration') lacks quantifiable metrics or operational definitions, risking inconsistent implementation across AI systems.
blockers.suggested_agenda_item: Clarify Scope Definitions for Ethical Principles

blockers.description: The motion mandates the creation of new committees (e.g., Ethics Review Committees, Human Oversight Board) and protocols without specifying budget, personnel, or infrastructure allocation.
blockers.suggested_agenda_item: Resource Allocation for Governance Framework Implementation

blockers.description: Amending Article X of the AI Governance Constitution may conflict with existing policies if the article's current content or other constitutional provisions contradict the mandated human oversight requirements.
blockers.suggested_agenda_item: Constitutional Alignment Review for Human Oversight Mandates

blockers.description: Implementing 'values alignment matrices' and 'ethical risk assessments' for all high-impact AI applications may be technically infeasible without standardized tools or frameworks for ethical evaluation.
blockers.suggested_agenda_item: Technical Feasibility Assessment for Ethical Evaluation Tools

blockers.description: The Human Oversight Board's composition (ethics as majority) may create conflicts with technical or legal stakeholders who prioritize efficiency or regulatory compliance over ethical mandates.
blockers.suggested_agenda_item: Stakeholder Alignment for Governance Board Composition
